name: Unnamed Medieval RTS
description:
THIS IS A DEMO

A medieval RTS that is currently in development.

Things you should know:
  • There's no audio yet, that's gonna be a bit later.
  • It's locked to 4 players for now until I figure out a better scaleable UI
  • CONTROLLER REQUIRED
    FEATURES:
    • Exciting 2-4 player gameplay
    • Fight in teams or every man for themselves
    • Procedurally generated world every game
    • Simplified RTS style gameplay
    • No limit to army size. Bigger army, better person.
    • Resource graph after the game ends
    CONTROLS (XBOX):

    Left Stick - Move

    Left Stick Click - Toggle Sprint

    Right Stick - Zoom in/out

    Y (Hold) - Select Nearby Units

    Y (Double Click) - Select All Units

    B - Deselect Units

    B (Hold for 10sec) - Surrender

    A - Move Selected Units To Player

    A (Hold) + RB/LB - Change Selected Units Formation

    X - Stop Moving Selected Units 

    RB - Open Build Menu (place buildings near base)

    LB - Open Units Menu (need building that produces units)

    RT - Attack (collect resources: trees, stone, food)

    Dpad Up - Change Unit Attacking Type

    Dpad Down - Select All Building Rally Points

    DEVELOPMENT -

    I am a solo developer and the game is continuously being worked on. If you find any bugs or have any criticisms please don't be afraid to share, I'm always looking for more feedback. 

    As well as bugs, if you have any ideas for new features, I'd also love to know.

    CONTACT -

    If you need to get in contact with me, there's a couple ways:

    • Twitter: @TheMaxPorter
    • Email: mx.porters@gmail.com
    • Comment section of this page
